tool_description: Smart Cargo is an easy web service-based Routing Optimization Software for Fleet Management, Field Service Management, mobile workforce Management and pickup or collection and delivery companies.
name: Smart Route Optimization
title: Smart Route Optimization

api_list.name: /resolve
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-cargo.p.rapidapi.com/smart-cargo/resolve"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-cargo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
